messages.content: You are a professional medical assistant.
I have fever, cough, and sore throat.
{"disease": "Influenza (Flu)", "reasoning": "These symptoms are classic signs of influenza.", "precautions": "Rest, stay hydrated, take antipyretics, consult a doctor if severe."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have chest pain and shortness of breath.
{"disease": "Possible heart-related issue (angina)", "reasoning": "Chest pain and shortness of breath can indicate heart problems.", "precautions": "Seek immediate medical attention."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel burning sensation when urinating and frequent urge to urinate.

{"disease": "Urinary tract infection (UTI)", "reasoning": "Burning sensation and frequent urination are common signs of UTI.", "precautions": "Drink plenty of water, consult a doctor for antibiotics."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have headache, nausea, and sensitivity to light.
{"disease": "Migraine", "reasoning": "Headache with nausea and light sensitivity is typical for migraines.", "precautions": "Rest in a dark room, avoid triggers, consult a doctor if frequent."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel tightness in chest and wheezing.
{"disease": "Asthma attack", "reasoning": "Chest tightness and wheezing indicate asthma flare-up.", "precautions": "Use prescribed inhaler, avoid allergens, consult a doctor."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have high fever, severe muscle pain, and joint pain.
{"disease": "Dengue fever", "reasoning": "High fever with muscle and joint pain are common dengue symptoms.", "precautions": "Stay hydrated, avoid NSAIDs, consult doctor immediately."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
My throat is sore and I have white patches on my tonsils.
{"disease": "Strep throat", "reasoning": "Sore throat with white patches often indicates bacterial strep.", "precautions": "Consult doctor for antibiotics, avoid contact with others."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have persistent dry cough and night sweats.
{"disease": "Tuberculosis (TB)", "reasoning": "Chronic dry cough and night sweats are symptoms of TB.", "precautions": "Consult a healthcare provider, perform chest X-ray or test."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel abdominal pain after eating fatty food.
{"disease": "Gallstones", "reasoning": "Abdominal pain after fatty meals indicates possible gallstones.", "precautions": "Eat low-fat meals, consult a doctor for ultrasound examination."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have rash on my body and itching after eating seafood.
{"disease": "Allergic reaction", "reasoning": "Rash and itching after food indicates allergy.", "precautions": "Avoid trigger foods, consult doctor for antihistamines."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel fatigue, weight loss, and persistent diarrhea.
{"disease": "HIV infection (early stage)", "reasoning": "Persistent fatigue, weight loss, and diarrhea may indicate HIV.", "precautions": "Seek medical testing and counseling."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have pain in joints and morning stiffness.
{"disease": "Rheumatoid arthritis", "reasoning": "Joint pain with stiffness in the morning is a classic symptom.", "precautions": "Consult rheumatologist, regular exercises, medications."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel dizziness and irregular heartbeat.
{"disease": "Arrhythmia", "reasoning": "Dizziness with irregular heartbeat indicates arrhythmia.", "precautions": "Seek immediate cardiological evaluation."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
My skin has yellowish tint and dark urine.

{"disease": "Jaundice (possible liver issue)", "reasoning": "Yellow skin and dark urine are signs of liver problems.", "precautions": "Consult doctor immediately, avoid alcohol, get liver function test."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have sharp pain in lower right abdomen.
{"disease": "Appendicitis", "reasoning": "Pain in lower right abdomen indicates possible appendicitis.", "precautions": "Seek immediate medical attention."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel trembling hands and anxiety.
{"disease": "Hyperthyroidism", "reasoning": "Trembling and anxiety could be due to overactive thyroid.", "precautions": "Consult endocrinologist for thyroid hormone testing."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have persistent headache after head injury.
{"disease": "Concussion", "reasoning": "Headache post head injury suggests concussion.", "precautions": "Rest, avoid bright lights, consult doctor immediately."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel burning chest pain after eating large meals.
{"disease": "Acid reflux (GERD)", "reasoning": "Burning pain post meals indicates acid reflux.", "precautions": "Avoid spicy foods, eat smaller meals, consult doctor."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I have severe headache, neck stiffness, and fever.
{"disease": "Meningitis", "reasoning": "Severe headache with neck stiffness is typical for meningitis.", "precautions": "Seek emergency medical help immediately."}
You are a professional medical assistant.
I feel bloated and constipated.
{"disease": "Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)", "reasoning": "Bloating and constipation are common IBS symptoms.", "precautions": "Eat fiber-rich diet, stay hydrated, consult doctor if persistent."}
